statements: UPDATE transaction_details SET amount = 100 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transaction_details SET sender_address = 'Sender1' WHERE transaction_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE transaction_details SET receiver_address = 'Receiver2', amount = 200 WHERE transaction_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE transaction_details SET amount = amount * 1.05 WHERE transaction_id = 'abc123';
UPDATE transaction_details SET sender_address = 'New Sender Address' WHERE transaction_id = 'def456';
UPDATE transaction_details SET receiver_address = 'New Receiver Address', amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 'xyz789';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100.50 WHERE sender_address = 'alice@example.com';
UPDATE blocks SET timestamp = '2022-03-15 14:30:00' WHERE block_id = 12345;
UPDATE transactions SET receiver_address = 'bob@example.com', amount = 75.25 WHERE transaction_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE blocks SET timestamp = NOW() WHERE block_id = 54321;
UPDATE transactions SET sender_address = 'new_sender_address' WHERE receiver_address = 'old_receiver_address';
UPDATE transaction_details SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE blockchain_blocks SET num_transactions = num_transactions - 1 WHERE block_id = 5;
UPDATE block_transactions SET block_id = 10 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174020';
UPDATE transaction_details SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE asset_type = 'USD';
UPDATE blockchain_blocks SET num_transactions = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM block_transactions WHERE block_id = 1) WHERE block_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_details SET sender_address = '123 Main St' WHERE transaction_id = (SELECT transaction_id FROM block_transactions WHERE block_id = 2);
UPDATE transaction_details SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE block_details SET transaction_count = 10 WHERE block_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE asset_details SET owner_address = '0xAddress123' WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE transaction_details SET amount = amount * 1.05 WHERE transaction_id = 'INSERT_TRANSACTION_ID';
UPDATE block_details SET transaction_count = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transaction_details) WHERE block_id = 'INSERT_BLOCK_ID';
UPDATE asset_details SET total_supply = total_supply + 100 WHERE owner_address = 'INSERT_OWNER_ADDRESS';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE sender_address = 'address123';
UPDATE blocks SET block_height = block_height + 1 WHERE block_id = 'block456';
UPDATE addresses SET balance = balance - 50 WHERE address = 'address789';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = 'c17026f1-16c0-4ab7-a140-f2d3e7993f57';
UPDATE holders h INNER JOIN addresses a ON h.address_id = a.address_id SET h.holder_name = 'John Doe' WHERE a.address = '123abc';
UPDATE assets SET asset_name = 'Gold' WHERE asset_id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7a8b-9c0d-e1f2a3b4c5d6';
